mapper.select: SELECT C_NO, C_NAME, C_SHORTINTRO, C_MAINSUMNAIL, C_DETAILSUMNAIL, C_LONG_INTRO, C_REFERENCE, C_PRICE, C_PERSTATUS, C_TYPE, C_HASHTAG, C_REGDATE, C_MINRECRUITPERSON, C_MAXRECRUITPERSON , T_NO FROM CLASS

SELECT DISTINCT C_DETAILSUMNAIL, C_NAME, C_SHORTINTRO, C_HASHTAG, C_PRICE, C_MINRECRUITPERSON, C_MAXRECRUITPERSON, TO_CHAR(C_LONGINTRO) C_LONGINTRO, TO_CHAR(C_REFERENCE) AS C_REFERENCE, T.T_NO, T_HAVENICKNAME, T_EXPERT, T_EXPERTNAME, S.S_NO AS S_NO, S_LOC, S_TYPE, S_MAINSUMNAIL, M_MAINSUMNAIL FROM CLASS C , RECRUIT REC , RENTAL REN , LEASE L , SPACE S , TEACHER T, MEMBER M WHERE C.C_NO = REC.C_NO AND REC.REN_NO = REN.REN_NO AND T.T_NO = REN.T_NO AND T.T_NO = M.M_NO AND L.L_NO = REN.L_NO AND S.S_NO = L.S_NO AND C.C_NO = #{cNo}

SELECT C.C_NO, REC.REC_NO, L_LEASEDATE, L_LEASETIME, L_PERSTATUS, COUNT(E.REC_NO) C_PERSON, C_MAXRECRUITPERSON FROM CLASS C, RECRUIT REC, ENROL E, RENTAL REN, LEASE L WHERE C.C_NO = REC.C_NO AND REC.REC_NO = E.REC_NO(+) AND REC.REN_NO = REN.REN_NO AND REN.L_NO = L.L_NO AND C.C_NO = #{cNo} GROUP BY C_MAXRECRUITPERSON, L_LEASEDATE, L_LEASETIME, L_PERSTATUS, C.C_NO, REC.REC_NO
ORDER BY DECODE(L_PERSTATUS,'진행','1','종료','2'), L_LEASEDATE ASC
ORDER BY L_LEASEDATE ASC
SELECT C_NO, C_NAME, C_MAINSUMNAIL, C_PRICE, C_TEMA, T_AREA, T_EXPERT FROM CLASS C, TEACHER T WHERE C.T_NO = T.T_NO AND C_TYPE = '일반'
SELECT C_NO, C_NAME, C_MAINSUMNAIL, C_PRICE, C_TEMA, T_AREA, T_EXPERT FROM CLASS C, TEACHER T WHERE C.T_NO = T.T_NO AND C_TYPE = '1명'

SELECT C.C_NAME, C.C_PRICE, C.C_DETAILSUMNAIL, L.L_LEASEDATE, L.L_LEASETIME, T.T_HAVENICKNAME, T.T_EXPERTNAME, S.S_LOC FROM CLASS C, RECRUIT REC, RENTAL REN, TEACHER T, LEASE L, SPACE S WHERE C.C_NO = REC.C_NO AND REC.REN_NO = REN.REN_NO AND REN.T_NO = T.T_NO AND REN.L_NO = L.L_NO AND L.S_NO = S.S_NO AND REC.REC_NO = #{no}
